channel.title: Server Renovating
channel.description:
Since I know know I am not aloud to double post I am going to edit this post. I have some problems that I have run into while I have been renovating my server. If you can help please post. Please don't take this as me asking you to do everything for me.
Problems While Renovating my Server: 1. Making door teleport you: I know I can make a door teleport me to somewhere, and I know to make it teleport me I have to put something in its Case ####:. The door I am having problems with doesn't have a case ####: in client.java. Can I add one for it? And for the teleport code itself, can someone lead me in the right direction for making one. 2.NPC talking: I need to make my NPC say something outloud. Which file can I put this in, and what can I search for finding the code to make it talk? 3.Death Point: What File can I search in and what do I search in the file to change the spot where I respawn when I die?
Like I said earlier please don't take this as me asking you to do everything for me in my server. This is just things that I have forgotten over the years, but once knew them.

item.title: Server Renovating
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

It worked for normal magic too. So thank you everyone who helped me! I would rep++ if I could.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Renovating
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Since it’s just a teleport, it’d only change the teleport for that spell.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Renovating
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

Sweet! Thank you.
Will that change the tele coords for normal magic too?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Renovating
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Ok, so when you searched you found this:

case 4140: case 50235:
Right?
Under case 50235: which is the ancients button i think
are the tele coords you change your coords and you’re done

Read full topic

@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

Since I know know I am not aloud to double post I am going to edit this post. I have some problems that I have run into while I have been renovating my server. If you can help please post. Please don’t take this as me asking you to do everything for me.

Problems While Renovating my Server:

  1. Making door teleport you: I know I can make a door teleport me to somewhere, and I know to make it teleport me I have to put something in its Case ####:. The door I am having problems with doesn’t have a case ####: in client.java. Can I add one for it? And for the teleport code itself, can someone lead me in the right direction for making one.
    2.NPC talking: I need to make my NPC say something outloud. Which file can I put this in, and what can I search for finding the code to make it talk?

Like I said earlier please don’t take this as me asking you to do everything for me in my server. This is just things that I have forgotten over the years, but once knew them.
